name: The Trash Garden
description:
Playing as one of many small creatures in a world of broken things, embark on a quest to make something beautiful from the trash all around you. Interact with other trash denizens to help them grow, and to help your garden grow, too. Each plant is a product of the seed that created it, and each garden is totally unique.

Controls:

  • Move - WASD or Arrow Keys 
  • Interact/Advance Text - Spacebar 
  • Skip dialog - Esc Key

Credits: 

  • Writing, design, programming - Olivia Dunlap
  • Collage artwork - Brad Sims
  • Music - Freesound artist LittleRobotSoundFactory

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created for Global Game Jam 2020 using the theme "Repair."
